getHostname

public java.lang.String getHostname()
The hostname to be sent in this passive check

Returns:
the hostname, defaults to "localhost"

useLocalHostname

public void useLocalHostname()
                      throws java.net.UnknownHostException
Use the short hostname of this machine in the passive check

Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - thrown if unable to determine the machines hostname

setHostname

public void setHostname(boolean useCanonical)
                 throws java.net.UnknownHostException
Set the hostname in the passive check

Parameters:
useCanonical - true to use this machines fully qualified domain name, false to use the short hostname
Throws:
java.net.UnknownHostException - thrown if unable to determine the machines hostname

setHostname

public void setHostname(java.lang.String hostname)
Set the hostname in the passive check

Parameters:
hostname - the hostname to use

getLevel

public int getLevel()
Get the level of the Passive check

Returns:
the level, default is UNKNOWN

setLevel

public void setLevel(int level)
Set the level of the Passive check

Parameters:
level - the level, use the constant field values LEVEL_...

setLevel

public void setLevel(java.lang.String level)
Set the level of the Passive check using a String The case of the String is ignored

Parameters:
level - either "ok", "warning", "critical" or "unknown"

getServiceName

public java.lang.String getServiceName()
The service name of this passive check

Returns:
the service name, default is "UNDEFINED"

serviceName - the service name
